body_text:
We want the control interface to only be available on the admin node behind the VPN; we have a setting ADMIN_ENABLED to control this: https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/normandy/urls.py#L15
This URLConf should only include URLs if the setting is true to avoid having it available outside the VPN.
body:
We want the control interface to only be available on the admin node behind the VPN; we have a setting `ADMIN_ENABLED` to control this: https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/normandy/urls.py#L15

This URLConf should only include URLs if the setting is true to avoid having it available outside the VPN.
body_html:
We want the control interface to only be available on the admin node behind the VPN; we have a setting ADMIN_ENABLED to control this: https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/master/normandy/urls.py#L15

This URLConf should only include URLs if the setting is true to avoid having it available outside the VPN.
